# gx-tab-caption

A container for tab items caption. Must be followed by a `gx-tab-page` element containing the tab item content.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                               | Type    |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | This attribute lets you specify if the tab page is disabled                               | `false` |
| `selected` | `selected` | This attribute lets you specify if the tab page corresponding to this caption is selected | `false` |

## Events

| Event         | Description                            |
| ------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| `onTabSelect` | Fired when the tab caption is selected |

---

_Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)_
